pages.title: Decryption Table
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Catalyst Decryption Table$() is used to view what $(#033dfc)random Catalysts$() will grant you certain modifiers!$(br2)Each random roll on a $(#033dfc)Catalyst$() has a different chance to roll different tiers of modifiers, and with this block, you can view $(#033dfc)10 Catalysts$() at the same time.
